message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for you!  I'm asking for $14,000 to start.  What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a bit of a budget. Can we meet in the middle?

Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. Could you do $12,000? That's already a significant discount from my initial asking price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but $12,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,500. Can we make a deal at this price?
